description: Try our easy to follow Peanut Butter Acai Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Acai bowl,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Peanut Butter Acai Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the Acai Energy sachet, frozen banana, frozen blueberries and coconut water in a high-power blender, blend until smooth and creamy.
Spoon into bowls and add desired toppings (banana, blueberries, raspberries and granola).
